description_en: In 2011, Marico Limited entered Vietnam market through a successful acquisition of ICP with the market leading ‘X-Men’ brand in male grooming products and the traditional Vietnamese sauces and condiments brand ‘Thuan Phat’. Since then, we have started our transition while expanding our coverage in South East Asia markets including Vietnam, Myanmar, Malaysia and Cambodia. On September 1st 2016, Marico South East Asia was officially announced to become the single home and continued our journey in leading the market across South East Asia
